name: Regent Suvarnabhumi Hotel

reviews.title: Good value, average facilities, ideal for a transfer stopover
reviews.text: Stayed 2 nights between flights, good value for what it is.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good transfers between airport and hotel, but needed chasing for departure one
reviews.title: Just 1 night in this hotel will do

reviews.text: Staff friendly and efficient, arranged a half day tour of temples for me whilst there, which was good value and the taxi driver/escort was good, although his English was limited
reviews.title: Perfect for overnight stopover and early flight out

reviews.text: Room was average sized, but pretty basic. Usual very hard Thai type bed, bathroom basic and sink tap very loose, but quiet and air conditioning effective enough
reviews.title: Not how I wanted to spend my last night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked with inclusive breakfast, but I wouldn't again, it consisted of two thin pieces of generic ham, a over-cooked fried eggs, two very anaemic frankfurter type sausages and tiny salad. This was accompanied by two slices cheap white bread and over sweet orange juice. I found that 5mins walk from hotel is a new Mall, with good restaurants, a night market etc, where there is a McD's and KFC if that is your thing in another country, but personally I found the MK a better Thai experience, one that is clean, efficient and very Thai
reviews.title: Perfect for airport stop over
Ok but better around
reviews.text: The hotel was ok but had the hardest bed in the whole trip in Thailand - where most beds are hard! Plus the hotel is right behind a recycling plant so there is always a bad smell and they start recycling at 7am. There are better airport hotel choices around.

I stayed just for one night in Regent Suvarnabhumi Hotel. The pick up from the airport to the hotel was quite efficient with someone waiting for you at the exit to take you to the shuttle bus. It takes from 5 to 10 min to get to the Hotel.
reviews.title: Good service and friendly staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are comfortable although the bathroom and toilet are a bit small. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: The resturant serve good food at a very good price and the service is fast.
reviews.title: Reasonable for one night, very close to airport

reviews.text: If I am again in an stop over in Bankhok I will for sure go back!
reviews.title: This hotel was perfect for an over night stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here on our way back from our SE Asia trip for 1 night, as a stopover hotel. Were met at the airport, driven to the hotel after a 20 minute or so wait, and checked in and shown our room. The room was very big, with a kitchen and balcony. Everything was clean and the bed big and comfy.
reviews.title: Great location for stopover, excellent service and rooms

reviews.text: Next day we took the 6.30 shuttle back to the airport to catch our flight. Couldn't fault the service, location, room or the price.
reviews.title: BIG Clean Room with Kitchenette, Great Price, Very Good Choice Near Airport (10 mins Drive)
Cheap and near airport is not always best!
reviews.text: Perhaps for longer terms stays this isn't the best place, as it's rather far from the sights, but then its main selling point is it's vicinity to the airport, so it's made quite clear what it's main purpose is, and for the it's more than worth it.

I booked this on agoda.com, great value for money USD32@ including free airport transfers exclusive of breakfast. Upon booking, I wrote under "special request" my flight details. Upon arrival, I saw their driver with my name held in the exit no. 4 area. I had to wait for 15-20 mins before boarding their new and clean mini van with other three or four guests arriving at similar time. The drive is around 10 mins.
reviews.title: Good Location but Terrible Receptionist !

reviews.text: They gave me a twin room. When entering into my room, I was very surprised. It's VERY SPACIOUS! with a kitchenette! and a balcony! sofa, desk and everything I need including kettle, refrigerator, complimentary bottled water. Air con, water heater all functional and quiet. Room clean, but bed a little bit hard but it's not a problem at all for me.
reviews.title: Great airport hotel

reviews.text: Its a good hotel for transit passenger for 1 night stopover. Good Value clean, friendly, free airport shuttle service, free internet and has a spa too. Rooms are equipped with tv, hot and cold water, a small attached kitchen with basic accesories and a small balcony. Its very cheap and better.
reviews.title: Good Airport Hotel for Transit Passenger!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel the day before arrival on Agoda.ca. I e-mailed the hotel with our flight details the day we were arriving. At the airport, there were people there to meet us, got us right on a shuttle over to the hotel and another group of people grabbed our bags while we checked in. We were brought up to our rooms (we were with another couple) which were gorgeous and obviously just renovated. We were only there for a few hours in the night as we had a late night flight coming in and early flight the next morning. They provided a wakeup call and had us on the shuttle and back to the airport on schedule. I would highly recommend staying here if you've got flights to catch.
reviews.title: great stopover hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here overnight while travelling from Bangkok to Krabi. Staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was clean - but you def get what you pay for. That's not a bad thing - it was great for over night and free wi-fi was fantastic. Would not stay there longer though, the bed was very hard and the bathroom wasn't great.
reviews.title: Clean - friendly - good overnight hotel

reviews.text: Booked as was close to airport for a early morning flight. Not sure what to expect.
reviews.title: Great Airport Hotel
Great Price, location, staff!!
reviews.text: Greeted by sizable well equpped room. Clean rooms and free shuttle transfer to airport booked at check in.

description: Conveniently located, Regent Suvarnabhumi Hotel is just an 8-minute drive away from Bangkok Suvarnabhumi airport and 25 minutes by car from Bangkok downtown provides spacious and comfortable accommodation. Rooms feature dark wood furnishing and are furnished with a small sitting area, a vanity and a 32-inch LCD television. It also has a kitchenette, ample workspace and free Wired & WiFi hi-speed internet access. Additionally, we also offer a-24-hour reception check-in and airport transfer services to ensure the ideal transit and stopover hotel in Bangkok airport area. Facilities include a mini-mart and a restaurant. For convenience, Regent Suvarnabhumi provides a free round trip airport transfer from airport to the hotel to specially accommodate guests-in-transit.
